name: Helium
long_description:
Helium's AI continuously experiments on monetization surfaces (signup, subscribe, upsell) to increase revenue. 

Today, growth teams use Helium's visual editor to create their in-app paywalls, then our ML system runs automated tests on messaging, experience, and pricing to drive conversion. 

For example, a social app with 20M MAU uses Helium to generate and test in-app paywalls to get more users to subscribe to their paid offering. 

We've earned $100M+ building AI conversion tools for Uber and Meta, and started Helium to help other companies do the same.
